item.title: Is Gaming a Luxury Now?
item.description:
In this episode of Gamertag Radio, hosts Danny Peña and Riana Manuel-Peña discuss their recent trip to Europe, including a visit to Remedy Entertainment. They delve into the topic of rising game prices, sparked by recent announcements from Xbox and Nintendo. The conversation explores the implications of these price increases on gamers and the industry as a whole, touching on the influence of shareholders and the nostalgia of past gaming prices.

Send us questions - fanmail@gamertagradio... Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/4949308.rss

item.title: Craig Randall
item.description: About Craig Randall [https://www.craigrandallwriting.com/home] - I've loved stories and literature and writing for as long as I can remember. For just as long, I've also struggled with anxiety and depression. They have loomed over me, all my life, threatening to steal away whatever hope and joy i've worked so hard to build. All my work, the fiction and the poetry, was born out of this struggle as I worked to overcome and deal the hardships these struggles brought on... Feed: https://feeds.zencastr.com/f/4v4HyCc6.rss
